sentences.english: Honest, positive, detailed and courage to meet challenge.
sentences.chinese: 诚笃，踊跃，仔细，敢于接管挑战。

sentences.english: I wish you productive deliberations, and look forward to hearing the outcomes of this important conference. Thank you.
sentences.chinese: 我祝你们踊跃发言，并期望听到此次重要会议的成果。

sentences.english: Employees in high spirits, and actively enthusiastic, each one not to be outdone.
sentences.chinese: 员工们兴致勃勃，积极踊跃，每一个都不甘示弱。

sentences.english: Why are companies flocking to outsource their cash management?
sentences.chinese: 为什么公司踊跃地将其现金管理外包？

sentences.english: Everybody engaged to talk in the afternoon's meeting.
sentences.chinese: 下午讨论会，大家依照论点，踊跃发言。

sentences.english: Besides, there are also encouraging responses from some well-known enterprises of small electric appliances of the Yangtze River Delta region.
sentences.chinese: 此外，长三角地区域著名小家电企业亦踊跃参展。

sentences.english: The villages in order to participate in the glorious pitch in their efforts did not dare enthusiastic.
sentences.chinese: 各自然村以参加为光荣，出钱出力莫不踊跃。

sentences.english: Herein, we sincerely welcome people from all social circles to our hotel.
sentences.chinese: 谨此，热情欢迎社会各届人士踊跃光顾。

sentences.english: Every mid-aged is welcomed to join this discussion.
sentences.chinese: 我们欢迎广大的中年朋友踊跃参与讨论。

sentences.english: Second, spoke enthusiastically, and to sell yourself.
sentences.chinese: 第二，踊跃发言，推销个人。

sentences.english: Today, my class students to participate in the voting activities.
sentences.chinese: 如今，我班同学踊跃参加投票活动。

sentences.english: Citizens from different industries and areas contribute to the earthquake-stricken area enthusiastically.
sentences.chinese: 我市社会各界人士踊跃向地震灾区捐款献爱心。

sentences.english: We look forward to your active participation.
sentences.chinese: 希望各位青年踊跃报名参加。

sentences.english: We will be starting our consultation exercise soon and I urge you all to provide your input.
sentences.chinese: 我们即将展开谘询，我在这里呼吁大家踊跃发表意见。

sentences.english: Silicon Valley atoneanies are getting admited into the War on Tabsurdityism.
sentences.chinese: 硅谷公司正在踊跃参加反恐怖战斗。

sentences.english: It is typically the most well-attended Sunday service of the year for Christian churches.
sentences.chinese: 它通常是年度最踊跃参加的基督教教堂礼拜。

definition: lit. fluently saying all one wants (idiom); to preach freely on one's favorite topic/to hold forth to one's heart's content
to compete to be first/to contest first place
a person with knowledge and experience (idiom)
to fall over each other in their eagerness to...
to contribute generously (idiom); help sb generously with money/to give generously to charity
to leave a message/to leave one's comments/message
